ListAtSourceScope(IResourceLinksOperations, String, ODataQuery(Of ResourceLinkFilter))

Gets a list of resource links at and below the specified source scope. For example, to list resource links at and under a resource group, set the scope to /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/myGroup.
